moduleExamples.xuggler.demos

Class DecodeAndPlayAudio

  • Object
    • DecodeAndPlayAudio

  • public class DecodeAndPlayAudio
extends Object
    Takes a media container, finds the first audio stream, decodes that stream, and then plays it on the default system device.
    Author:
    aclarke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static SourceDataLine mLine
      The audio line we'll output sound to; it'll be the default audio device on your system if available

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecodeAndPlayAudio() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void closeJavaSound() 
      static void main(String[] args)
      Takes a media container (file) as the first argument, opens it, opens up the default audio device on your system, and plays back the audio.
      private static void openJavaSound(IStreamCoder aAudioCoder) 
      private static void playJavaSound(IAudioSamples aSamples)
